DOC.brief_title: Incidence Post-Operative Pain After Single Visit Root Canal Treatment Necrotic Teeth Using Two Different Rotary Systems ( Protaper Nex & Neolix File )
DOC.detailed_description: Interventions : Using neolix file ( Ori kam SAS , France ) Control : Using Protaper next file ( Dentsply , Maillefer , Switzerland ) Treatment case complete one session follow : - Full medical dental history use schematic dental chart obtain patient treat study . Each tooth evaluate vitality ( sensitivity ) pulp tissue use electric pulp tester ( Kerr , Analytic Technology Crop , Redmond , WA ) . - Patient anesthetize ; teeth isolate rubber dam . - Make access work length determine use electronic apex locator ( Root ZX , J.Morita USA , Irvine , CA . ) confirm intraoral periapical radiograph , 0.5-1 mm , short radiographic apex . - Cleaning shape do use crown preparation technique rotary file either 1. neolix file , first file use C1 file size 25 taper 12 % orifice opener coronal flare 2/3 canal length A1 file size 25 taper 8 % narrow curve canal size 10 K file ( Mani , Japan ) loose pass easily canal , case K-file size 20 loose canal choose large file size 40 taper 4 % either full working length full work length ( X-Smart , Dentsply Maillefer , USA . ) , speed 300-500 rpm torque 1.5 N.cm 2. protaper next sequence use Prepare straight line access canal orifice . The ProTaper SX file may use . Explore canal use small-sized hand file , determine work length , verify patency confirm smooth , reproducible glide path . Always irrigate necessary , expand glide path use small-sized hand file dedicate mechanical glide path file . Path Files P1 P2 recommend . In presence NaOCl , brush follow glide path , PROTAPER NEXT™ X1 ( 017/04 ) file , one pass work length reach . Use PROTAPER NEXT X2 ( 025/06 ) , exactly describe PROTAPER NEXT X1 file , work length passively reach . Gauge foramen size 025 hand file , file bind length , canal shape ready disinfection . If size 025 hand file loose length , continue shape PROTAPER NEXT X3 ( 30/07 ) , necessary , PROTAPER NEXT X4 ( 040/06 ) PROTAPER NEXT X5 ( 050/06 ) , gauge instrument 030 , 040 050 hand file , respectively . During canal shaping , irrigate , recapitulate small-sized hand file sequential PROTAPER NEXT instrument , re-irrigate . endodontic motor accord manufacturer instruction ( X-Smart , Dentsply Maillefer , USA . ) , torque 2.0 N.cm speed 300 rpm . - The rotary file introduce inside canal use EDTA gel `` MD-Chelcream , META BIOMED CO. , LTD , Korea '' . - The canal thoroughly irrigate use 3 ml 2.5 % Sodium hypochlorite every subsequent instrument . After instrumentation canal , paper point use dry . - Obturation carry use gutta percha cone ( 25/0.6 40/0.4 ) Or Protaper next cone accord instrument use canal size resin sealer ( ADSEAL , META BIOMED CO. , LTD , Korea ) .After obturation cotton pellet place pulp chamber access cavity close temporary filling avoid coronal leakage .
